column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Long Feng says : " I 'm very disappointed in your work with the Avatar and his friends , Joo Dee .
#Text=I do n't think I can keep working like this !
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Joo Dee , the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai .
#Text=" Joo Dee says : " I am honored to accept his invitation .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Good .
#Text=Now go await further orders .
#Text=If the Avatar keeps searching for his bison , it could upset the delicate balance we 've worked so hard to achieve in this city .
#Text=It could even cost us control of the Earth King .
#Text=" Dai Li agent says : " Should we take care of him ?
#Text=" Long Feng says : " No .
#Text=It 's much too dangerous for us to confront him directly .
#Text=Let 's see if we can still handle this quietly .
#Text=" Iroh says : " So , I was thinking about names for my new tea shop .
#Text=How about the Jasmine Dragon ?
#Text=It 's dramatic , poetic , has a nice ring to it .
#Text=" Zuko says : " The Avatar is here in Ba Sing Se and he 's lost his bison .
#Text=" Iroh says : " We have a chance for a new life here .
#Text=If you start stirring up trouble , we could lose all the good things that are happening for us .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Good things that are happening for you !
#Text=Have you ever thought that I want more from life than a nice apartment and a job serving tea ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " There is nothing wrong with a life of peace and prosperity .
#Text=I suggest you think about what it is that you want from your life and why .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I want my destiny .
#Text=" Iroh says : " What that means is up to you .
#Text=The Tea Weevil !
#Text=No , that 's stupid .
#Text="
